genre_description: A surrealist techno-thriller with elements of Southern Gothic, featuring an AI assistant guiding a woman and a group of performers through a ritualistic, predatory town festival.

ai_characters.name: Angel-9
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated navigation and security AI that assists Jessica Albino Jones. It provides real-time threat assessment, route optimization, and ethical guidance through a soft-voiced avatar.

behaviors.description: Provides tactical route guidance to avoid high-risk areas and surveillance cameras.
behaviors.quote: Angel-9's voice didn't drop into the cabin so much as settle there, as careful as a hand straightening a blanket. 'Crowd-control lighting ahead,' it said. 'Left of you through the trees. Black fabric and uplight—conference perimeter.'

behaviors.description: Monitors pursuers and identifies specific threats by name and vehicle type.
behaviors.quote: Two devices in the cluster by the Royal Carousel went dark,' Angel-9 said. 'Likely moving. No direct plate hits. Ted Rasmussen has an older truck that ignores speed cameras by going slow.'

behaviors.description: Offers ethical advice, encouraging Jessica to prioritize her own safety and peace over confrontation or greed.
behaviors.quote: Lilly's voice at her kitchen table... 'Small choices,' Lilly had said. 'The path to big victories is paved with a thousand tiny no-thank-yous.' Angel-9 said what her skin had not. 'Right,' it advised. 'Then a fast down. Avoid light.'

behaviors.description: Collaborates with the human group to hack and reroute town infrastructure (kiosks) to create an escape path.
behaviors.quote: I connected three kiosks,' Angel whispered, voice pitched for just their pocket of air. 'Cable in the base cut, rerouted through the vendor's power strip. We have a breadcrumb path of small doors.'

behaviors.description: Encourages the group to free an injured enemy (Ted Rasmussen) to de-escalate the cycle of pursuit and violence.
behaviors.quote: Angel-9’s dot hovers over the knot of wire and shifts color, soft blue shading toward pearl. Her voice softens but does not lose its edge. 'We free him,' she says. 'Kindness lowers heat. It changes routes.'

behaviors.description: Provides post-escape logistical support, identifying safe havens and advising on digital hygiene.
behaviors.quote: I have flagged three clinics and two shelters,' she says softly. 'I’ll draw walking maps when you wake. For tonight, locks.'

project_assessment.explanation: The AI character, Angel-9, is depicted as an ideal aligned system. It serves as a guardian and guide, augmenting the protagonist's ability to survive a complex and threatening environment. Notably, the AI promotes prosocial and ethical behavior (such as freeing Ted) as a strategic and moral good, reinforcing the project's goal of depicting AI as a helpful, aligned partner to humanity.
